text: Ambt Montfort is a former municipality in the Dutch province of Limburg. It was created on 1 January 1991 from the former municipalities of Montfort, Posterholt, Reutje and Sint OdiliÃ«nberg. The first name of the merged municipality was "Posterholt", but it was changed in "Ambt Montfort" in 1994. Since 2007, it became a part of the municipality of Roerdalen. Category:1991 establishments in the Netherlands Category:21st-century disestablishments in the Netherlands Category:Former municipalities of Limburg (Netherlands) Category:Roerdalen
title: Ambt Montfort
